Question: Meta Eye Top CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Meta Eye Top CES 2024

- 40 languages real-time translations
- Real-time in-ear translations
- Ideal for classrooms and meetings
- Real-time translations for up to 20 people
- Palm-sized device with a screen
- Includes two earbuds for translations
Summary_cn:
Meta Eye CES 2024顶级展示

- 40种语言实时翻译
- 实时耳机翻译
- 适用于教室和会议
- 提供最多20人的实时翻译
- 掌上尺寸，带屏幕的设备
- 包含两个耳机进行翻译
